Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: indigo leather book on Residents of Triskellion: Letter C
An indigo leather book on the residents of Triskellion whose names start with the letter 'C'. The border of the cover neatly displays an embossed trail of grapevines.
An indigo leather book on the residents of Triskellion whose names start with the letter 'C'.

An indigo leather book. On the upper portion of the cover is the title of 'Residents of Triskellion: Letter C' and printed smaller beneath it are the words 'edited and compiled by Xena'. The border of the cover neatly displays an embossed trail of grapevines.
indigo leather book cover

An indigo leather book. On the upper portion of the cover is the title of 'Residents of Triskellion: Letter C' and printed smaller beneath it are the words 'edited and compiled by Xena'. The border of the cover neatly displays an embossed trail of grapevines.

a desription of Caelith

"Caelith:
Caelith is a towering statuesque timber wolf, with long, shaggy white fur, and shoulder-length wavy white hair. He has sharp jet-black eyes and a prominent nose. A guard for House Doloreaux, his exact rank is unknown. It is said he has served in almost every embassy, only to betray each one time and time again. His lust for women is quite evident, especially if you are a woman. He spends his time flirting, trying to woo (quite successfully in a lot of cases), and philosophizing on life and love. He has a knack for finding out information through casual conversation, much like myself. He can be very nosy around people he can't figure out, assuming if roundabout ways of gathering information on them doesn't work, a direct route will. He currently has romantic interests in myself, miss Liza, and Doctor Grace; beyond that, I'm uncertain. More information will be added as it is uncovered."
Update 8.10.890 - Caelith is still his usual self, and unsurprisingly his interest in women have changed. He currently spends most of his time lurking around miss Leigh and chiding her for her choices in friends. To my knowledge he isn't affiliated with any of the Houses any longer, but rather just wanders about looking for a random spar to show off the only skill he has: combat strength. The aforementioned miss Liza left the city some time ago, as did Doctor Grace; as for myself, Sir Edmond finally stepped in with Caelith and suggested he stop stalking me or face some serious issues. It seems that it worked, as he won't even speak to me any longer."

It seems that it worked, as he won't even speak to me any longer."
a description of Caliste

"Caliste:
Caliste is a slim svelte palamino, with even, silky golden brown coat, and waist-length glossy golden blonde hair. She has crystal blue eyes and a fine nose. Property of the Zephyr Slavery Company and Baronet Eberhard Delhomme von Doloreaux, she is a war slave captured by the Doloreaux during a border skirmish on the river Lyore and sold to Triskellion for profit. The Company is currently renting her out to anyone with interest since the Baronet is out of town. More information will be added as it is uncovered."
"Update 8.9.890 - Aforementioned slave appears to have left town still in slavery. The Avoirdupois did manage to confirm her former gentry status, but did nothing to reacquire her from the Doloreaux."

"Caliste:
Caliste is a slim svelte palamino, with even, silky golden brown coat, and waist-length glossy golden blonde hair. She has crystal blue eyes and a fine nose. Update 8.9.890 - Aforementioned slave appears to have left town still in slavery. The Avoirdupois did manage to confirm her former gentry status, but did nothing to reacquire her from the Doloreaux.
a description of Captain Carlon

"Captain Carlon:
Captain Carlon is a huge broad-shouldered rhinoceros, with a thick, stony grey hide, and trimmed feathery black hair. He has heavy lidded chocolate eyes, a blunt nose, and sharp horns. Captain of the Rinaldi Guard, Carlon has a distinguished and stern demeanor. This informant has never spoken directly with him, but has been privileged to be in his presence on a handful of occasions, including Reeve Leah's funeral. It is said he and the Reeve were close and the loss of her life came as a great blow. Aside from his intelligence and the way women fawn over him when you ask questions, the general population was less than helpful when researching him. More information will be added as it is uncovered."
Update 8.10.890 - Captain Carlon left town for awhile, and after a short amount of time, so did his lover Dasha. She said she needed to go and aid him and his family, but has yet to return. He, however, did return and has been partaking in the occasional spar with people he is known to dislike (Caelith included, see page 1 of this volume).

He, however, did return and has been partaking in the occasional spar with people he is known to dislike (Caelith included, see page 1 of this volume).
a description of Baroness Charlot

"Baroness Charlot:
Baroness Charlot Bisclavret is a shapely timber wolf, with sleek silver fur, and waist-length silky reddish brown hair. She has sharp moss green eyes and a long nose. A Noble in the Great House Bisclavret, and acting trade Ambassador, she started out in Triskellion as a Dame and then promoted herself to Baroness. Members of her house have expressed to me their displeasure in that particular decision, but I have always observed her to be a very hard-working individual and so cannot say it was an undeserved raise. In her presence, one can experience many feelings and be the recipient of many different personalities; at times she is good-natured, giggly, and quite free spirited. At others, she is dismissive, irritable, and entirely unhelpful. She is sister to Baron Tomas of the Muire Forest, but I have yet to meet him for any good length of time to theorize how their relationship and his continuous departures personally impact her. She is currently suiting Baron Murdoch, Admiral of the Bisclavret Navy. More information will be added as it is uncovered."

Baroness Charlot Bisclavret is a shapely timber wolf, with sleek silver fur, and waist-length silky reddish brown hair. She has sharp moss green eyes and a long nose. At others, she is dismissive, irritable, and entirely unhelpful. She is sister to Baron Tomas of the Muire Forest, but I have yet to meet him for any good length of time to theorize how their relationship and his continuous departures personally impact her. She is currently suiting Baron Murdoch, Admiral of the Bisclavret Navy. More information will be added as it is uncovered."
a description of Chen

"Chen:
Chen is a slim athletic otter, with short, grey fur, and shoulder-length delicate silver hair. She has indigo eyes and a pert nose. A member of the Stormbreaker Crew, Chen is known to be ruthless and hot-tempered. She has a love for sparring and fighting in the nude, and is known to bed both men and women depending on her mood. She enjoys dressing scantily and is fearless in her admissions of interest and lust. I believe she generally fights with daggers, but it has been some time since I personally engaged in any sort of combat with her. She is currently in a relationship with Mister Sang of House Bisclavret, but it is not known to the public. More information will be added as it is uncovered."
Update 8.10.09 - Miss Chen left town shortly after my original entry and has not returned since.

Update 8.10.09 - Miss Chen left town shortly after my original entry and has not returned since.
a description of Chinco

"Chinco:
Chinco is a large rugged wolf, with long, sleek brown fur, and light black hair. He has smooth sideburns, silver eyes, and a sharp nose. Once a member of the Black, Chinco has served in almost every embassy and been kicked out or deserted them due to his beliefs and/or actions. Fairly quiet most days, he spends his time in the west commons or down by the docks and apple trees, lazing about when he isn't picking fights. He seems to have a decent relationship with Mistress Meepers, gentry of the Rinaldi, and miss Senora, gentry of the Doloreaux, though whether it is because they understand him or simply give him something to sleep with, I'm uncertain. You can find out a considerable amount by searching through the Constabulary records, where a long list of crimes bearing his name have been filed. Recently, Marquis Alessandro di Rinaldi stripped him of his right to bear arms in public at the request of the Guild Council. It is believed by some he is currently in a relationship with miss Senora, but it could not be confirmed or denied by myself. More information will be added as it is uncovered."
Update 8.9.890 - Miss Senora returned to town after a long absence. She still lingers around Chinco but he seems less smitten than he once was. He spends a good amount of time with a dwarf rabbit named Nan who he's fairly protective of, and has become more social on the whole, even taking to sitting around in the commons conversing with Mistress Meepers of the Rinaldi and other passerby. For a time he was employed with the Bisclavret under their former Quartermaster, mister Brendon, but at some point he was either released from service or he quit. He was just commenting the other day on his need to join an embassy again, though why he would even bother what he knows he will fail at is beyond me.

a description of Clayton

"Clayton:
Clayton is not someone I have met personally, and so I have no physical description on him. The residents tell me he is a powerful mage, both feared and loved. There is a story that gets told from time to time about how he opened a portal to hell in the commons and therein fought and vanquished a daemon with the help of some of the local warriors and a Lady. Fact or fiction, I don't know. I've never overly believed in magic. His current whereabouts are unknown. More information will be added as it is uncovered."
Update 8.9.890 - Mister Clayton has not yet returned to town and people don't expect him to apparently. Still, I will look for information on his past actions so that there is a solid entry should it be needed for referencing in the future.

a description of Clover

"Clover:
Clover LePlow is a horse, but beyond that I cannot recall his physical description. Owner of LePlow jewelers, he worked his way up from a simple commoner to a wealthy merchant and provider of fine goods. He is known for monopolizing the jeweling industry and for being an accomplished fisherman. Aside from this information, which was primarily lent by miss Dasha when I expressed an interest in possibly joining her during my first few weeks here, I have little to no information about him. More will be added as it is uncovered."
Update 8.10.890 - Clover LePlow is a giant, broad-shouldered clydesdale with a smooth roan coat and hazel-streaked chestnut hair. He has short sideburns and round chocolate eyes. After my departure from the Avoirdupois, I wandered about for a time trying to decide what to do with myself. Clover hired me on as a banker so I could make some coin until I found some personal direction, and it was while working for him that I inquired about the Sailors Guild and its inactivity. I admit I was just mostly curious, but he saw my curiosity as an opportunity and arranged a meeting for me with mister Fenton who was, at the time, leading the guild. We chatted for about an hour before he decided he was going to turn his gold ring over to me, which seemed to please Clover a good amount. A vote was initiated that same night and I was placed into the leadership position of the Sailors. Clover is known for treating his people well, and he'll do anything to help you so long as you don't cross him or take advantage of his kindness. His hospitality is both a great strength, and a great weakness; something I have told him on countless occasions. It seems to be one of Sir Matteo's goals to shut him down due to his prosperity, wealth, and control over Docktown, but I must wonder where the common people would be if they didn't have a common leader among them. Many people who otherwise would go unemployed and engage in crime are working honorably in the service of Clover, taking up skills they probably never imagined they would learn - jeweling, guarding, banking, merchanting, nearly anything one can think of. Clover is currently engaged to miss Lianaar, steward of the Bisclavret. A wedding date has not yet been set, but probably will be in the near future.

a description of Crina

"Crina:
Crina is a dainty lean fox, with even, silky copper fur, and waist-length smooth black hair. She has green eyes and a fine nose. A member of one of the local seamstressing guilds, she spends the majority of her time in the commons or in the room of her lover, mister Arthurr. She doesn't talk much at all to people she doesn't know, and so there is very little that this informant can share. More information will be added as it is uncovered.
Update 8.10.09 - Miss Crina still hangs around mister Arthurr, though their actual relationship is unknown. She currently is a seamstress for Rainbow Rags and also wears a ring bearing the sign for the College of Medicine. I don't see her actively doing anything unless she's talking to Clover, at which point she appears to be engaged and alive.

a description of Cullan

"Cullan:
Cullan is a towering stalwart buffalo wolf, with trimmed, sleek blue-black fur, and shoulder-length ruddy red hair. He has a trim goatee, red eyes, and a thin nose. Quartermaster of House Bisclavret, he was recently promoted, though I could never confirm what rank was bestowed upon him. Many women say he is fliratious, but I have never experienced that in his presence. Most would dub him a loyalist, both to Baroness Charlot and to the recently returned Viscountess of Langston, whom I have yet to meet. The Constabulary has a file on him which speaks about him being murdered by Captain Geradan of the Stormbreaker Crew. Sources say this occurred over a scuffle between the Captain and the aforementioned Lady and a hole being blown in his ship. I have not seen the Captain to inquire about what occurred and receive confirmation, but enough people know that even if it weren't true, it is being perceived as truth. He has no known romantic interests. More information will be added as it is uncovered."
After having spent more time with Cullan, I've found that our personalities clash immensely. He is the sort who seems to know everything without having to do any research, and so I find myself often times boggled by his assumptions or supposed truths and irritated at his opposition to everything I say. He seems to have good intentions, though, so one does grit and bear it as one can. I do occasionally take to irking him to make myself smile, which is more than probably impolite of me, but I'm not always known for being polite. He is a good source to approach should people need information on pirates and ports, though why he is so educated on such topics I couldn't begin to imagine. Cullan is currently engaged to Mistress Pru, a local Docktown carpenter.

a description of Caitriona

"Caitriona:
Caitriona is a small lissome arctic wolf pup with short fuzzy white fur, waist-length spangled champagne-blonde hair, and sprightly indigo eyes. Daughter to Baroness Charlot Bisclavret, she was sent off to boarding school for a time to learn propriety. People comment about 'wit beyond her age', her love for politics, and her moodiness. I haven't met the child myself so know nothing outside of general chit-chat and gossip.

"Caitriona:
Caitriona is a small lissome arctic wolf pup with short fuzzy white fur, waist-length spangled champagne-blonde hair, and sprightly indigo eyes. Daughter to Baroness Charlot Bisclavret, she was sent off to boarding school for a time to learn propriety. People comment about 'wit beyond her age', her love for politics, and her moodiness. I haven't met the child myself so know nothing outside of general chit-chat and gossip.
a description of Chulainn

"Chulainn:
Chulainn is a burly grey wolf with coarse dark grey fur and yellow eyes. He has no hair. Currently he is employed by miss Rhea, local pirate. There was a recent incident involving him supposedly attacking a Bisclavret Handmaiden with his bare hands. She, for whatever reason, did not press charges so it cannot be confirmed through the Constabulary. From my personal experience, he is a competitive sort, always looking to get somewhere first, especially when it comes to gathering information. He has a quick temper, but has been known to quickly apologize for stepping out of line. More information will be added as it's uncovered.

"Chulainn:
Chulainn is a burly grey wolf with coarse dark grey fur and yellow eyes. He has no hair. Currently he is employed by miss Rhea, local pirate. a description of Cincin

"Cincin:
Cincin is a tiny sickly skunk with with short black fur and waist-length blonde hair. She has short-sighted old-looking eyes that seem to have lost most of their coloring. Guildmistress of Rainbow Rags, a local seamstressing group, she has risen to prominence through hard work and good bargains. She isn't known to have romantic interests, and, in fact, is thought to be married to her job. She is the local senior milliner (she makes hats) and is responsible for giving jobs to clothiers who might not otherwise be able to make it on their own. There was a time when people considered Mistress Meepers to be her rival, but I have only witnessed cooperation between the two, and so cannot confirm. Cincin is known to be a devout follower of S'allumer. More information will be added as it is uncovered.

the spine of the book
The spine of the book is made from indigo leather.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[M] \$delay(2, TRUE, "030f"); EmitTo( \$actor, "The pamphlet does not react to you in any way except to look more daunting and self-assured in its knowledge.");
